issue.title: [Packaging] Don't attempt to download arrow archive in linux builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2875](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2875). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the version increment the rakefile expects there is an already uploaded archive.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2875?focusedCommentId=16562736) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2288
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2288>
